/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily hustle and bustle. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. 

The highway is teeming with cars, predominantly in shades of white, black, and red, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. Overhead, a concrete overpass stretches across the highway, a testament to the city's infrastructure. 

On either side of the highway, lush green trees and bushes line the road, providing a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the overpass, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene.
